entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's the VeloBand Pulse. I bought it a little over two weeks ago.
Okay, I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Sure, it's user123@email.com. Look, I don't have all day. I just want to get this return sorted.
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order… Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse purchased on the 1st. Today is the 16th. Unfortunately, our return window is 10 days from the date of purchase.
What?! Ten days? That's ridiculous! I just want to return this thing. It doesn't even track my heart rate properly. I should get my money back!

I understand your frustration. Our standard return policy is indeed 10 days. While I can’t offer a full refund due to being outside the return window, I can explore other options. A policy exception is not possible in this case as our systems are automated. Let me see if store credit would be a viable alternative. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? Seriously? I wanted my money back! This is unbelievable. I probably won't even use anything else from VeloFit! This VeloBand Pulse was a waste of money!

I completely understand. While I can’t make an exception to our policy regarding a full refund, I want to ensure you have a positive experience with VeloFit. Instead of just the store credit for the VeloBand Pulse, I can also offer you an additional 10% off a future purchase with that store credit, to make up for the inconvenience. How does that sound?
Hmm... 10% extra on top of the store credit? Alright, I guess that's... better. I suppose I can find something else on your site I need. Maybe some new cycling gloves.
Great! I've applied the store credit plus the additional 10% discount to your account. You should see it reflected immediately. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you for your help. Even though I was annoyed at first, I appreciate you finding a solution.
You're very welcome! We value your business. Have a great day!
